subject: Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
Playoff Games
Golf
lead_paragraph: Torrential rain from the remnants of Hurricane Gustav washed out the first round of the BMW Championship, the third event in the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs.
snippet: Torrential rain from the remnants of Hurricane Gustav washed out the first round of the BMW Championship, the third event in the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs.
